segments.text: I am afraid I have some bad news for you . It's about our order contract O5TSWAL .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The goods arrived half a month later than scheduled . What's more , five cases were found broken and unit inside seriously damaged .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? That's something unexpected . You see , all our exports were strictly inspected before shipment . The goods were in perfect condition when they left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But then there were some cracks in a number of cases . Almost all the bottom of the cases were loose .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That could have happened in the course of transit or unloading , due to rough handling .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But our surveyors found the damage was caused by poor packing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But there is nothing wrong with our packing . Our cartons are standard export ones and we also enforced them with straps .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you filled the cartons too full and the straps are not strong enough . When they were rehandled , some of them were broken .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think the stevedores could have handled them with great care .
segments.speaker: S2
